The figure entered the doorway and confirmed what Love had guessed; it really was Setsuna Higashi AKA Cure Passion, as the dark purple-haired girl let out a comforting smile toward the pajama-wearing Love Momozono. Unfortunately for Love, she could most definitely see that something was wrong when she looked at Setsuna; the Setsuna in front of her was really fat.

Judging from her appearance, Setsuna looked to be weighing around 500 pounds, as her entire body was coated in a bulky load of body fat. Her thick legs were touching, as Setsuna sported a set of plump cankles. She was currently wearing a pale red shirt underneath a white vest with a pair of beige shorts, as Setsuna's fat apron belly was stuffed inside her shorts, shirt, and vest, making them bulge out, as well as showing how large and fat her butt was.

Along with that, Setsuna sported a larger pair of breasts, which appeared to be a size Triple D-Cup, while the sleeves of her shirt showed how fat her arms were, and showing off a fat face, with a pair chubby cheeks and a double chin. Overall, Love could see that something wasn't right here. So in response, Love looked at the fat Setsuna and said....
14111221.title: Sumo Fresh Pretty Cure

choices: Tightly hugged her out of sympathy, feeling Setsuna's bulky fat body.
Looked at Setsuna and asked if there was anyway she could help.
141112212.content:
"Oh, I'm glad you noticed." Setsuna replied, displaying a gentle but content smile, just as she moved her tubby right hand and pat the front of her fat apron belly a few times, almost as if she was very happy to be at her current size, letting out a small giggle to feeling her fat abdomen jiggle. Then, looking back at Love, Setsuna spoke toward the confused hazel-haired girl and answered, "Anyway, to answer your first question, Love-chan: It's....a little hard to fully explain. But to put it simply, you're in an A.D, Love."

"An A.D? Um...what are you talking about, Setsuna?" Love asked, becoming even more confused than she currently was. After all, Love was known to dislike studying, unless said studying heavily involved dancing. But in response, Setsuna looked at the confused Love Momozono and replied, "A.D is a codename Tart has given, it stands for 'Alternate Dimension'. In other words, this isn't the world you originated from, Love. And I am not the Setsuna you remember, which is why my appearance seems so...different to what you're familiar with."

From what she was hearing, Love was completely unsure how to react to this sort of news. Sure, she has heard of the whole idea of an alternate dimension or some related nonsense, but she saw it as something from a science fiction movie! And from the looks of things, it gave Love a bit of a headache.

Shortly after sitting back down on the very large bed, Love looked back at the rotund Setsuna and asked, "But....why? Why take me from my own world?" But then, from looking at the obese girl next to her, Love could see a look of seriousness but also some grief mixed together, as the rotund Setsuna waddled up to the bed and sat down next to Love, letting out a sigh and answered, "I'm...I'm not going to lie to you, Love; We're in serious trouble. You see, something happened to this world's version of you, Sumo Cure Peach."

"Sumo...Cure....Peach?" Love asked, wanting some answers as to what was going on, but also becoming a little confused as to how there was another version of her, especially one as big as the rotund Setsuna sitting beside her. It was then that the bulky Setsuna pulled out what appeared to be a poster, showed it to Love, and replied, "Here, this is what she looks like."

Upon reaction to seeing this other Cure Peach, Love was completely surprised by how much this Sumo Cure Peach looked very similar to the real Cure Peach, with some minor differences, of course. First off, Sumo Cure Peach appeared to be a lot fatter than Love when she becomes Cure Peach. Second, the outfit was the same but with a few alterations, as there was a white and pink mawashi loincloth that meshed in with the frilly pink and white skirt on the outfit. Not to mention the knee-high pink heel boots didn't look like the original boots that Cure Peach would wear. Instead, they looked more like a pair of white Sumo sandals, with pink greaves and pink knee-high socks, as the greaves were being used like a set of leg armor, giving Sumo Cure Peach a bit of additional protection.

"Wow, she....she looks almost exactly like me when I'm Cure Peach." Love thought to herself, surprised but nearly speechless at the similarities between her Cure Peach, and this Sumo Cure Peach. But from there, Love remembered what the obese Setsuna had said about the situation, looking back at the fat version of her friend and asked, "Setsuna, you....you said that something...happened to the other me, so um....what happened?"

"*sigh* It....It all happened so fast, Love. Soular ambushed us with his cronies. I've never trusted him, even back when I used to be on the same side as him. He was always a conniving little coward, and they say that it's always the quiet ones that will get you. Despite us fighting at our hardest, Soular managed to...to...he grabbed Sumo Peach, dammit! We tried going after him, but Soular used her as a hostage, and threatened that if we followed him, he was going to kill Peach! So we just watched as he dragged her away with, and I swear Love, I swear we'll get you back! *sob*" Setsuna exclaimed, showing through her emotions how bad the situation was, referencing to this world's version of Love.

However, from having a big and passionate heart, Love felt really torn and extremely sorry for what Setsuna and the other "Sumo Pretty Cures" were currently going through, especially since they had no choice but to watch Sumo Cure Peach get dragged away by Soular as both a hostage and kidnapping victim. So in response to seeing the rotund Setsuna having a bit of a meltdown, Love....

1411122121121.content:
Although she was already aware of the two large girls' presence, Setsuna looked toward the secret identities of Sumo Cure Pine & Sumo Cure Berry, greeting them and said, "Good morning!" "Yeah. *loud yawn* Good morning to you too, Setsuna-chan." Inori replied, yawning mid-sentence, which caused her voice to sound an octave or two lower than her original voice, just as the large ginger-haired girl rubbed the sleep out of one of her eyes with one hand, while scratching her ginormous rear with the other, waddling over to one of the reinforced chairs positioned at the feast-covered table.

Becoming a little concerned about her friends, Setsuna looked toward the rotund Inori and Miki, where she then put a slightly chubby hand upon her plump right hip and asked, "Judging from how tired you two seemed to be, I am guessing you're still worried about Love, aren't you?" Miki answered, obviously sounding a little depressed due to her and the other Sumo Cures being unable to save Sumo Cure Peach from being held hostage by that damned Soular while she waddled up to her own reinforced chair and sit down, causing Inori to speak once more and replied, "Me too."

Despite staying silent through the conversation, hearing such grim and depressing percussions in the aftermath of the real Sumo Cure Peach being kidnapped made Love feel even more depressed than usual, since she's known to be easily hurt by such thoughts. However, what got the hazel-haired girl out of that depressed muck was when the bulky Inori and Miki both began to notice Love sitting in the reinforced chair that appeared to be too large for such a skinny little thing like her.

Believing that their depression and lack of sleep might be causing them to imagine things, both Inori and Miki rubbed their eyes and shake their heads a bit to regain some consciousness,hoping that their hallucinations would dissipate. Why am I still seeing a skinnier Love-chan sitting with us?" "*Giggle* That's because you both aren't hallucinating, my friends." Setsuna reassured, confirming to both Inori and Miki that they were not seeing things, shocking both Sumo Cures as they quickly got up from their reinforced seats and spoke in unison as they said, "What?! You mean that-" "Yes, my friends. Please allow me to introduce you to Love Momozono, she's just like the Love-chan we all know and love, but she is originally from a different world. A different Earth, to be more precise." Setsuna answered, waddling up to the seated Love, who obviously felt quite small compared to these Sumo-sized versions of her best friends & fellow Cures.

How can there even be another version of Earth?" In response to the confusion her two friends were receiving, Setsuna decided to explain to them as she answered.....
1411122121121.title: Sitting Down For Breakfast

choices: 20 to 30 minutes later, Love's hunger finally receded....for now, anyway.

14111221211211.content:
But then, just before Setsuna was even able to utter a single word, her own stomach began to growl furiously, causing her apron belly to jiggle repeatedly from the expanded organ's roar. "Anyway, I'll explain everything while we eat our breakfast, alright? After all, I think our stomachs are getting restless down there, don't you think?" Setsuna answered, looking down at her flabby abdomen for a moment before returning her gaze toward her friends and the foreign Love Momozono.

From Love's point of view, the rotund Setsuna and her two equally large comrades nodded in agreement, prompting the 3 obese versions of her own friends to sit down on the same yet equally large reinforced chairs Love herself was still placed upon, with Inori and Miki moving their chairs a little closer toward the hazel-haired girl before sitting back down in their seats, while Setsuna sat down in a chair just several feet away from Love. From there, breakfast had begun.

////

Fast forward 15 minutes into the large feast that was breakfast, the four girls were still eating. Setsuna ate a good supplement of pancakes covered in thick chocolate maple syrup, using a knife and fork to consume the spongy stack of flapjacks, all whilst explaining to Inori and Miki as to how the former villainess was able to pull off such a feat as to bring another version of Love/Sumo Cure Peach into their world. While they listened to their friend, Inori & Miki consumed their favorite breakfast dishes, with Inori guzzling down an entire gallon of Orange Juice, while Miki ate a mixture of blueberry waffles and pancakes, piled on top of one another like a sandwich.

But as for Love; She felt like she had died and gone to Heaven, as she consumed a 4 foot tall strawberry-flavored wedding cake with gusto, using her two bare hands instead of eating utensils. And yet, the one thing that Love couldn't get off her was that for some odd reason, she couldn't tell herself to stop! It was as if her stomach had overridden her mind. However, it wasn't until Setsuna tried to get the hazel-haired girl's attention that Love stopped her food-craving rampage, as Setsuna said, "Hey, Love! Are you listening to me?!"

When Love stopped dead in her tracks, she still had a mouthful of chewed-up strawberry cake in her mouth, causing her cheeks to look all swollen up from storing the spongy dessert remains inside her mouth, while her hands and fingers were coated in a cake frosting mess, merely from tearing off big chunks of the wedding cake. But as Love swallowed the cake remains within her own maw, Miki looked at her, chuckling a little, and asked, "So, you're THAT hungry, are you?"

"Well, I don't know....it's just that I've never felt this hungry before in my whole life, ya know? I-It's like my stomach just went out of control." Love said, confused as to why she was suddenly so ravenous. Fortunately, Setsuna gave an explanation to the hazel-haired girl and answered, "Since you originally are not from our world, my guess is that your body's anatomy is adapting to coincide with this reality. After all, most or all of our world's women are....well, they're pretty much Sumo-sized, depending on how much they indulge and binge, of course. Simply put; the skinnier your body is, the more ravenous and hungry you are."

"So....you're saying that I need to get f-fatter in order to fit in this odd world, not just to replace the real Sumo Cure Peach until after we rescue her from Soular?" Love asked, starting to gain a better understanding as to how this weird world works exactly. Though in response, just after she finished off every last drop of Orange Juice within the large glass mug, wiping off a bit of the remaining juice on her mouth, Inori leaned back a little in the reinforced chair, as she turned her chubby head to look at Love and answered, "Well, from what Setsuna-chan explained to us while you were tearing apart that cake, it seems like the only plan so far."

"And besides, once we rescue the real Sumo Cure Peach, we'll be able to send you back to your own world, Love." Miki said, who looked at the skinnier version of her friend as well, taking another bite out of her blubbery waffle-pancake combo, blissfully moaning from how tasty it was in her mouth and taste buds. But once again, Love's hunger began to rub rampant once more, despite her stomach not even feeling full yet. Left with no other choice, Love began to assault what remained of the oversized strawberry cake, already feeling her body plumping up just a little more, causing her pajamas to become a little more snug than usual.

1411122121121132.title: Meanwhile, in the dark desolate Labyrinth Kingd...

choices: Meanwhile, back at the Sumo Cure dojo.......
Meanwhile, within the dark and desolate Labyrinth Kingdom......
1411122121121133.content:
Meanwhile, along the rooftops of the dense urban known as Clover Town, a lengthy rodent-like creature known as a ferret quickly scurried across the rooftops. In appearance, it's fur was a very light brown color with a stomach covered in white fur. The inside coloring of it's ears were a peach-tan hue, as it sported these brown eyes that often appeared to be somewhat red in color. But around it's neck, the ferret wore a purple-blue cloth-like shawl. To any passerby, the creature looked like a cute little ferret. But to the Sumo Cures, this dressed-up ferret was Tarte, their ferret mascot and Prince of the Sweets Kingdom.

Now, as for why he was scurrying along gritty and vacant rooftops instead of residing with the Sumo Cures at their residence, Tarte was currently investigating something.....uncanny that he had sensed during the very moment when Sumo Cure Peach was taken hostage by the infamous Soular. Sure, he was already aware of Soular's presence, but he detected something else over the course of that dramatic event. If there was even a single word to describe what he sensed, Tarte could only describe it as something......new.

When he sensed the unknown essence, it had this dark aura to it, which made him think that Soular wasn't alone. But then, he also sensed an aura of light alongside the dark aura, which caused him great confusion, unsure as to what he was sensing. Was it good, or was it evil? Was it a friend, or an enemy? Either way, this aura of both light & dark still stayed fresh in the prince's thoughts, so he was left with no choice but to find out the answer for himself.

////

Finally, after what almost seemed like a few days, Tarte returned to the location of where he detected the mixed aura, intent on getting some answers to this mystery. Scanning his environment, he followed the trail of the aura. After all, the ferret was familiar with aura as a sort of lifeforce, which meant to him that he might have been sensing something that was alive. So after carefully following the trail the aura left behind, Tarte was led to what appeared to be a hidden lair of sorts on the roof of a 7-story building.

"So, this is where the trail led me." Tarte thought to himself, as the ferret mascot slowly and cautiously entered this hidden sanctuary, unaware of who or what he was actually dealing with here. Looking from left to right, Tarte noticed that there was a bed, a small TV laying on a workshop table, a laptop, and an amory cabinet made out of titanium, loaded with what appeared to be semi-automatic and bolt-action sniper rifles.

However, when Tarte jumped up on top of the workshop table, he saw something that shocked him to the core; There was a map of Clover Town posted on the wall above the table, along with photos taken of the Sumo Cures from a distance, as if somebody was watching them, or.....hunting them. Those two words made Tarte's fur stand on end a little from the mere thought, which made the otherworldly prince ask himself, "What kind of person would do something like this?"

Unfortunately for Tarte, he was about to get his answer, as the ferret suddenly felt something quickly grab him with inhuman speed and reflexes, pinning him down to the surface of the workshop table, unable to wriggle himself free, try as he might. "Na, was haben wir denn hier? Ein Gespräch Nagetier. Warum bin ich nicht so überrascht? [Well now, what do we have? A talking rodent. Why am I not so surprised?]" A voice said, obviously from whoever was restraining Tarte to the tabletop. However, Tarte couldn't understand what his captor was saying. So out of overreacting, Tarte ended up speaking to his captor and yelled, "What are you even saying?! I can't understand your gibberish, yade!"

"Verdammt. Ich dachte mir, diese Gespräche Ratte würde Deutsch nicht verstehen [Damn it. I figured this talking rat wouldn't understand German]." The captor growled, cursing himself for speaking in what Tarte would assume to be his native tongue, which meant he definitely wasn't from Clover Town. Although he was unable to see what his captor looked like, Tarte heard his captor pull something out, which was a Mauser C96 semi-automatic pistol, as the ferret felt his captor put the tip of the gun's barrel on top of Tarte's head, threatening to kill him if he resists.

"Now then, my little rodent. Can you understand what I'm now? Answer me!" The captor growled, indicating to Tarte that his captor was a male, using a stern and serious voice to speak toward the ferret. Intimidated somewhat, Tarte quickly spoke up and answered, "Yes, yes! I can understand you-yade!" "Good. Now then, here's how things are going to work. I will ask you a question or two, if you happen to answer correctly, then I will spare you from receiving death."

"A-And if I give you the wrong answer?" Tarte asked, obviously frightened by his captor. However, it wasn't until the male captor pulled on the Mauser's hammer, causing it to make this loud click, giving the ferret just a pretty good idea as to what happens if he gives his captor the wrong answer, just as he heard the male captor said, " Then I will be ze executioner to your demise. So, Who are you?"

Left with no other options, Tarte was forced to answer his interrogator as he replied, "M-My name is T-Tarte. I.... I-I am a prince from the Sweets Kingdom." "A prince, huh? So, das war Anton nicht ein Verrückter, nachdem alle. Ich bin zu einer Form von Lizenz sprechen von einer übernatürlichen Reich [So, Anton wasn't a madman after all. I'm talking to some form of royalty from a supernatural kingdom]." The captor said to himself, transitioning to his native tongue before swapping back to a language that Tarte was able to understand.

Getting himself back on topic, Tarte's captor then spoke to him once more and said, "So, 'your highness'; What is your objective here on this world? After all, you are quite far from home to call for your royal guards. *Chuckle*" Despite his captor mocking him a little, Tarte tried not to snap to the best of his abilities before speaking to whoever he was dealing with and answered, "I..... I-" But when he couldn't answer, his captor unleashed a quick but strong squeeze, forcing Tarte to confess to make his captor stop as he yelled, "I guard the Clover Orgel of Happiness with the Sumo Cures! Stop squeezing me, please-yade!"

From hearing what Tarte had to say, the male captor quickly stopped squeezing the ferret when he mentioned the Sumo Cures. "You.....You work for the Sumo Cures?" The captor asked, his voice having this tone of surprise mixed in with his foreign accent. Shortly after taking a breath or two, Tarte then spoke toward his captor and answered, "Yes, I work with the Sumo Cures, and I *cough* I know you're trying to hunt them down."

"Maybe I AM hunting them, maybe I'm not. That depends on your perspective of this world, Prince. Now leave before I change my mind and shoot you on the spot!" The captor growled, as he then quickly threw Tarte outside, just as the ferret quickly scurried away back to the Sumo Cures. But back in the hidden lair of Tarte's captor, he went toward his custom bolt-action sniper rifle, inspecting it a little before having the strap slung over his head and hanging his shoulder. From there, he looked out the window and thought, "Ich hoffe, Sie Sumo Cures hergestellt werden, weil bereit oder nicht, ist Hans Wolfe auf der Jagd [I hope you Sumo Cures are prepared, because ready or not, Hans Wolfe is on the hunt]."

Let me know when she wakes up, Setsuna." ////

141112212112113311.content:
Upon feeling the newfound softness underneath her skin and seeing that her belly was no longer the size of a large yoga ball, the very first thing that came to Love's mind as she slowly sat up came in only a simple mere question; How much did she currently weigh now? After all, she was completely unsure as to how much food she had actually consumed during breakfast. Though from judging how snug her pajamas felt right now against her skin, the hazel-haired girl could only assume that it was a lot of food.

But as she was about to stand up from the futon bed, Setsuna quickly became of the awoken Love, prompting the rotund purple-haired girl to approach the recently awoken Love and said, "Well, you certainly had a nice refreshing nap. Um, are you feeling okay there, Love? You seemed to be very worried about something."

"I..... I-I'm not really sure right now. Setsuna, I need you to be honest with me here; How much, um......how m-much weight did I gain from earlier? Please, I need to know." Love hesitantly asked, nervous about how fat she might've gotten from eating such a humongous breakfast. From seeing Love's behavior, Setsuna sat down beside Love, putting a plump right hand on the hazel-haired girl's shoulder, doing her best to keep Love calm for what she was going to say. From there, Setsuna turned her chubby head to look at Love and answered, "Look, I'm not going to sugarcoat it for you, Love-chan; You've eaten quite a lot of food, had me worried about your stomach capacity. However, judging from how much food you had consumed a few hours ago, I would have to guess that you have gained possibly around an estimate of one hundred pounds."

"A-A-A H-HUNDRED P-P-POUNDS!?" Love yelped, her reaction was a powerful mix of shock, disbelief, and embarrassment, merely from the fact that she had went from being skinny, to outright chubby. On her face, Love's cheeks were a little fuller than they originally were, as her neck was slightly thicker than she remembered. Her arms were slightly puffier than usual, as her breasts grew from a miniscule B-Cup to a decent-sized D-Cup, while her flat stomach had ballooned into a cute pot belly with an adorable muffin top. But as for her lower half, Love's waist, hips, and butt had thickened up with a thin but noticeable amount of fat, while her thighs had fattened up to the point of nearly touching one another.

Overall, the formerly thin Love Momozono was now a very chubby girl, taking that first step into becoming a temporary replacement for the real Sumo Cure Peach. However, in an attempt to reassure the greatly shocked and embarrassed Love, Setsuna......

1411122121121133111.content:
Attempting to combine the right words to say to the embarrassed hazel-haired girl, Setsuna gently sat her corpulent buttcheeks down on the reinforced futon, sitting on the left side of the chubby Love Momozono. From there, Setsuna turned her plump head to look at Love, where the obese purple-haired girl spoke and said, "Listen Love, I can.....understand that you feel rather, um.....let's go with demoralized, about gaining weight until you're as large as the real Sumo Cure Peach....."

Love didn't say anything in response, just as Setsuna slowly turned her fat bulky frame to face the chubby hazel-haired girl. In an effort to gain her attention, Setsuna put a plump hand under Love's chin, turning her head to face the large purple-haired girl, prompting Setsuna to speak and answered, "However, this does not mean that all you will become is a big fat ball of lard and adipose."

Hearing what Setsuna had said to her just now made the hazel-haired girl even more confused than she was embarrassed, causing Setsuna to giggle a bit from Love's confusion, where the purple-haired girl said, "What? Did you think that all we were going to do is fatten you up to immobility?" ".....A little." Love timidly muttered, obviously unsure about what the obese version of one of her 3 friends, her pink eyes scanning around her environment a little.

"I think it would be best if I show you. Wait here for a moment, I'll be right back." Setsuna answered, requesting for Love to wait for a moment, as the rotund Setsuna stood up from the futon and waddled down a different hallway from the same hallway the two girls had trekked through. Left with no other choice but to wait, Love simply just sat her now chubby behind on the futon, letting out a bored sigh, waiting for Setsuna and whatever she wants to show her.

/// 5 MINUTES LATER ///

Finally, after waiting impatiently enough to the point of falling asleep out of boredom for Setsuna to return, Love was about to get the answer as to what exactly did the former villainess wanted to show her. But it wasn't until the hazel-haired girl heard what sounded like a loud metal clang that she quickly woke up, showing this surprised look on her slightly chubby face, prompting Love to quickly sit back up on the futon, looking toward the source of that metallic noise.

However, it was revealed to be none other than the morbidly obese Setsuna, who had brought out what appeared to be a large weight used for weightlifting. This left Love quite confused at the sight before her, as she looked at the rotund purple-haired girl, scratching the back of her head and asked, "Um, Setsuna-chan? W-What's with that exercise weight you brought in?"

"Oh, its something rather simple I want you to do, Love; I want you to lift up this 40 pound weight right here with only one hand." Setsuna answered, putting a plump hand on her fat hips, wanting the chubby hazel-haired girl to perform such a ridiculous feat in Love's eyes. At first, Love thought that the rotund former villainess had lost her mind, but became somewhat convinced since she was in a completely different version of the world she knew.

So, after making her final decision, Love chose to go along with Setsuna's idea, grabbing the handle that was connected directly to the 40 pound weight. From there, she pulled her arm up with the weight in tow. And to Love's surprise, she was able to lift up the 40 lb. weight using one hand with such ease! Seeing what had happened by her hand caused Love's eyes and mouth to open out of mere shock and awe. Though, the reaction on the hazel-haired girl's face was pretty much priceless for Setsuna.

"B-B-B-But I don't understand! H-How am I able to lift this thing up so easily?!" Love said, shocked to see how strong she was despite bearing a rather plump physique. So in response to the surprised hazel-haired girl, Setsuna simply turned her gaze toward Love and answered, "Well, allow me to elaborate, Love-chan. You see, when you were eating breakfast earlier, not only were gain weight in body fat, you were also gaining some muscle underneath all of that flab. And as a Sumo Cure, your strength, endurance, and durability are dramatically increased to superhuman levels. In other words, you can get hit head-on by a big rig carrying a fully loaded trailer and barely feel a scratch on you!"

"So, what you're saying is the fatter I am, the stronger I become.....right?" Love asked, her mind putting the pieces together as to how she was able to lift up a 40 pound weight with such ease in her current state. In response to Love's guessing, Setsuna nodded in agreement to the hazel-haired girl's assessment of her situation. But then, shortly after speaking to her skinnier comrade from an alternate universe, Setsuna.....

Ichika is a cheerful young girl who loves sweets. However, she isn't the best at cooking. She does have a lot of confidence when it comes to decorating sweets and making animal sweets though. When she is full of happiness or really excited, she hops around like a "rabbit".

Ichika can also come off as clumsy, such as not knowing how to behave elegantly or accidentally cramps herself and trips over during a tea ceremony.

1543221222221.content:
Kirahoshi Ciel is one of the six main cures in the series KiraKira☆Pretty Cure A La Mode. She is known as the "Genius Pâtissière" who had been working in Paris, France before paying a visit to Ichigozaka for a special demonstration.

Sweet, lively and generous, Ciel/Kirarin is said to be a genius patissière who wishes to make others happy through the sweets she makes. She is extremely diligent and always sought for improvement in order to become perfect as shown during her time as an apprentice in her fairy form, and her efforts paid off as she acquired the ability to transform into a human, which she goes under the name of Ciel.

However, success soon blinded her, and she began to neglect to her brother Pikario, which led to their estrangement. She was truly overwhelmed by her guilt and self-hatred of not understanding him like Ichika does, which turned out to be her fatal weakness and begot to her loss of her dream after Noir thieved her Kirakirarus, but fortunately she then overcame her sadness after tasting one of her brother's failed waffles and learned to understand her brother Pikario with a deeper comprehension.

Also, her desire of achieving perfection by relying herself so as to avert embarrassment can be an obstacle for her. For example, she refused to admit how she always revert into fairy form when extremely hungry, which ignited a chaos at at school. But as the series progresses, she begins to accept help from her friends and cooperate with them.

Overall, Ciel is a caring and goodhearted girl who not only cares for her brother and friends, but also her enemies. For example, she treats Bibury with kindness during her encounters with the latter and even rescuing the latter courageously.

Her original form is a fairy named Kirarin. Ciel's alter ego is Cure Parfait, known as the Pretty Cure of Dreams and Hope and she has a parfait and Pegasus theme.

How will she expand?
